changeSet.createView: select t.thread_id, (select m.message_id from message m where m.thread_id = t.thread_id order by m.idate asc limit 1) as initial_message_id, (select m.message_id from message m where m.thread_id = t.thread_id order by m.idate desc limit 1) as latest_message_id, (select count(*) from message m where m.thread_id = t.thread_id) as message_count from thread t;

changeSet.createView: select cp.conversation_participant_id, cp.conversation_id, (select count(*) from message m where m.conversation_id = cp.conversation_id and m.idate > cp.last_check) as unread_count from conversation_participant cp

changeSet.createView: select distinct(a.account_id) as account_id, m.media_id as media_id from media m inner join account a on m.related_object_id = a.account_id where m.media_owner_type = 'USER' and m.file_type = 'PROFILE_PIC' and m.passive_id is null;
